org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.name: debian
org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.title: Debian
org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.content: <div><p>On Debian Squeeze, add the following to your <i>/etc/apt/sources.list</i>:</p></div><div><pre>deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/midgardproject:/ragnaroek/Debian_6.0/ ./</pre></div><div><p>On Debian Lenny, add the following to your <i>/etc/apt/sources.list</i>:</p></div><div><pre>deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/midgardproject:/ragnaroek/Debian_5.0/ ./</pre></div><div><p>Then just install Midgard1 via <i>apt-get update</i> and <i>apt-get install midgard-data</i>. After this completes you can set up the system with <a href="#datagard">Datagard</a>.</p></div>
